title: Al-Muwatta
text: One of the earliest collections of Ahadith text based on the subjects of Islamic Law, compiled by Imam Malik Ibn Anas.

title: Fiqh-us-Sunnah
text: The Ahadith collection about Fiqh (Islamic jurisprudence) written by Shaikh Sayyid Saabiq. Accepted by all the four major madhabs.

title: Sahih Al-Bukhari
text: The most authentic Ahadith collection of the sunnah of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) written by Imam Muhammad al-Bukhari.

title: Sahih Muslim
text: One of the major and authentic Ahadith collection about the sunnah of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) compiled by Imam Muslim ibn al-Hajjaj.

title: An-Nawawi
text: A collection of the 42 Ahadith of Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) compiled by the Islamic Scholar Yahia bin Sharaful-Deen An-Nawawi.

title: Jami' at-Tirmidhi
text: Jami’ at-Tirmidhi also known as Sunan at-Tirmidhi is one of the six books of the Kutub al-Sittah and is compiled by Imam Abu Isa Muhammad at-Tirmidhi (RA).

title: Hadith Qudsi
text: Hadith Qudsi or Hadith Qudse means “holy Hadith” and are attributed to the revelations from Allah (SWT) while the wordings are credited to Prophet Muhammad (PBUH).

title: Sunan Abu Dawood
text: Sunan Abu Dawood is one of the six books of the Kutub al-Sittah and is compiled by Imam Abu Dawud al-Sijistani.

title: Prophet's Last Sermon
text: Acquire the golden guidance from Prophet Muhammad (PBUH) delivered to the entire Muslim Ummah in his last sermon.
